content: अनुज --जात {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} Born after, later, younger; राममनुजातः <ls>P. III. 4. 72</ls>; असौ कुमारस्तमजोऽनुजातः <ls>R. 6. 78</ls>; पुमांसमनुरुध्य जाता पुमनुजा <ls>Sk.</ls>; so स्त्र्यनुजा. --जः, --जातः {@--1@} A younger brother; <ls>Ms. 5. 58.</ls> {@--2@} A cadet; born again, after born, younger, later. {@--3@} Taking after. {@--4@} Born again, invested with the sacred thread. --जा , --जाता {@--1@} A younger sister. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of a plant (त्रायमाणालता). --जं <ab>N.</ab> of a plant (प्रपौंडरीक).
